thread.title: Samantha doesn't have black money: Father
thread.title_full: Samantha doesn't have black money: Father - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Samantha doesn't have black money: Father
text:
After the sudden IT raid in the houses of several celebrities including Vijay and Nayantara, father of actress Samantha who was also one of the targets, has said that the raid wasn't an issue as they had paid advance tax because they knew something like this was going to happen.
"There is no black money with us. It's all pure white money for which we are paying tax. The IT officials asked us the same and we clarified it too", said Joseph Prabhu, father of the actress.
